SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `group` WHERE group_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')

SELECT g.id, g.group_name as groupName, g.group_description as groupDescription, g.owner_id as ownerId, u.username as ownerUsername, g.group_avatar_url as groupAvatarUrl, g.status, g.max_members as maxMembers, g.member_count as memberCount, gm.role, g.create_time as createdAt, g.last_transfer_at as lastTransferAt, g.transfer_count as transferCount FROM `group` g LEFT JOIN user u ON g.owner_id = u.id LEFT JOIN group_member gm ON g.id = gm.group_id AND gm.user_id = #{userId} WHERE gm.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY g.create_time DESC
